verses.verse: These are the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285>, which the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to make <WH3772> with the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, beside the covenant <WH1285> which he made <WH3772> with them in Horeb <WH2722>.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto all Israel <WH3478>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH7200>, You have seen all that the Lord <WH3068> did <WH6213> before your eyes <WH5869> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and unto all his servants <WH5650>, and unto all his land <WH776>;
The great <WH1419> temptations <WH4531> which your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200>, the signs <WH226>, and those great <WH1419> miracles <WH4159>:
Yet the Lord <WH3068> has not given <WH5414> you an heart <WH3820> to perceive <WH3045>, and eyes <WH5869> to see <WH7200>, and ears <WH241> to hear <WH8085>, unto this day <WH3117>.

And I have led <WH3212> you forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>: your clothes <WH8008> are not grown old <WH1086> upon you <WH5275>, and your shoe is not grown old <WH1086> upon your foot <WH7272>.
You have not eaten <WH398> bread <WH3899>, neither have you drunk <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink <WH7941>: that you might know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

And when you came <WH935> unto this place <WH4725>, Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us unto battle <WH4421>, and we struck them <WH5221>:

And we took <WH3947> their land <WH776>, and gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> unto the Reubenites <WH7206>, and to the Gadites <WH1425>, and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4520>.
Keep <WH8104> therefore the words <WH1697> of this covenant <WH1285>, and do <WH6213> them <WH7919>, that you may prosper in all that you do <WH6213>.

You stand <WH5324> this day <WH3117> all of you before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>; your captains <WH7218> of your tribes <WH7626>, your elders <WH2205>, and your officers <WH7860>, with all the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478>,

Your little ones <WH2945>, your wives <WH802>, and your stranger <WH1616> that is in <WH7130> your camp <WH4264>, from the hewer <WH2404> of your wood <WH6086> unto the drawer <WH7579> of your water <WH4325>:

That you should enter <WH5674> into covenant <WH1285> with the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and into his oath <WH423>, which the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> makes <WH3772> with you this day <WH3117>:

That he may establish <WH6965> you to day <WH3117> for a people <WH5971> unto himself <WH430>, and that he may be unto you a God, as he has said <WH1696> unto you <WH7650>, and as he has sworn unto your fathers <WH1>, to Abraham <WH85>, to Isaac <WH3327>, and to Jacob <WH3290>.
Neither with you only do I make <WH3772> this covenant <WH1285> and this oath <WH423>;
But with him that standeth <WH5975> here with us this <WH3426> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and also with him that is not here with us this day <WH3117>:
(For you know <WH3045> how we have lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>; and how we came <WH5674> through <WH7130> the nations <WH1471> which you passed by <WH5674>;
And you have seen <WH7200> their abominations <WH8251>, and their idols <WH1544>, wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>, silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, which were among them:)

Lest there should be <WH3426> among you man <WH376>, or woman <WH802>, or family <WH4940>, or tribe <WH7626>, whose heart <WH3824> turneth away <WH6437> this day <WH3117> from the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, to go <WH3212> and serve <WH5647> the gods <WH430> of these nations <WH1471>; lest there should be <WH3426> among you a root <WH8328> that bears <WH6509> gall <WH7219> and wormwood <WH3939>;

And it come to pass <WH8085>, when he hears the words <WH1697> of this curse <WH423>, that he bless <WH1288> himself in his heart <WH3824>, saying <WH559>, I shall have peace <WH7965>, though <WH3588> I walk <WH3212> in the imagination <WH8307> of my heart <WH3820>, to add <WH5595> drunkenness <WH7302> to thirst <WH6771>:

The Lord <WH3068> will <WH14> not spare <WH5545> him <WH639>, but then the anger of the Lord <WH3068> and his jealousy <WH7068> shall smoke <WH6225> against that man <WH376>, and all the curses <WH423> that are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612> shall lie <WH7257> upon him <WH3068>, and the Lord shall blot out <WH4229> his name <WH8034> from under heaven <WH8064>.

And the Lord <WH3068> shall separate <WH914> him unto evil <WH7451> out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>, according to all the curses <WH423> of the covenant <WH1285> that are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451>:

So that the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> of your sons <WH1121> that shall rise up <WH6965> after <WH310> you <WH5237>, and the stranger that shall come <WH935> from a far <WH7350> land <WH776>, shall say <WH559>, when they see <WH7200> the plagues <WH4347> of that land <WH776>, and the sicknesses <WH8463> which the Lord <WH3068> has laid upon it <WH2470>;

And that the whole land <WH776> there is brimstone <WH1614>, and salt <WH4417>, and burning <WH8316>, that it is not sown <WH2232>, nor bears <WH6779>, nor any grass <WH6212> grows <WH5927> in it <WH4114>, like the overthrow of Sodom <WH5467>, and Gomorrah <WH6017>, Admah <WH126>, and Zeboim <WH6636>, which the Lord <WH3068> overthrew <WH2015> in his anger <WH639>, and in his wrath <WH2534>:
Even all nations <WH1471> shall say <WH559>, Why has the Lord <WH3068> done <WH6213> thus unto this land <WH776>? what means the heat <WH2750> of this great <WH1419> anger <WH639>?

Then men shall say <WH559>, Because they have forsaken <WH5800> the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of their fathers <WH1>, which he made <WH3772> with them when he brought them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:
For they went <WH3212> and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and worshiped <WH7812> them <WH430>, gods whom they knew <WH3045> not <WH2505>, and whom he had not given unto them:
And the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against this land <WH776>, to bring <WH935> upon it all the curses <WH7045> that are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612>:

And the Lord <WH3068> rooted <WH5428> them out of their land <WH127> in anger <WH639>, and in wrath <WH2534>, and in great <WH1419> indignation <WH7110>, and cast <WH7993> them into another <WH312> land <WH776>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

The secret <WH5641> things belong unto the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>: but those things which are revealed <WH1540> belong unto us and to our sons <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, that we may do <WH6213> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451>.
